Home > More News >    Edinburg City Leaders to be Sworn In

Edinburg City Leaders to be Sworn In

– The City of Edinburg invites the community and media to celebrate a new chapter in city leadership. Mayor-Elect Omar Ochoa and Councilmember Place 1 Dan Diaz will be officially sworn in during a ceremony on Wednesday at 6:30 p.m. at the Edinburg ACE. This event marks the beginning of their terms and offers an opportunity to witness the city’s leadership transition. : Edinburg ACE,315 W. McIntyre, Edinburg : Wednesday, November 12, 2025 : 6:30 p.m. Media are encouraged to attend.
415 W University Dr. Edinburg, Texas 78539
  • City Hall Phone: 956-388-8204
  • Utilities Phone: 956-388-8212
  • Utilities Emergencies Phone: 956-388-8220
  • Utility Billing Phone: 956-388-1896
  • Planning & Zoning Phone: 956-388-8202
  • City Secretary Phone:  956-388-1854
  • Human Resources Phone: 956-388-1873
  • HelpLine Phone: 956-259-4357
